dcterms:description: Synthetic data generated to contain a nonlinear causal link, with variables following the relations from a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) and forming a structural causal model.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Datasets

dcterms:creator: A. Jesson
P. Manshausen
A. Douglas
dcterms:description: Cloud and aerosol observations dataset consisting of gridded measurements from the Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer, used to analyze aerosol-cloud interactions.
dcterms:title: Cloud and Aerosol Observation Dataset
